10.1109/ASONAM55673.2022.10068681.title: Noise Audits Improve Moral Foundation Classification
10.1109/ASONAM55673.2022.10068681.author: Mokhberian, Negar and Hopp, Frederic R. and Harandizadeh, Bahareh and Morstatter, Fred and Lerman, Kristina
10.1109/ASONAM55673.2022.10068681.paperMotivationText: Noisy annotations in moral values classification training data harms classifiers' classification capabilities.
10.1109/ASONAM55673.2022.10068681.paperContributionText: They propose two metrics to audits the noise of annotations in moral values classification datasets.
10.1109/ASONAM55673.2022.10068681.paperResultsText: Based on experiments conducted on three datasets, they show that removing noisy annotations based on their two proposed metrics improves classification performance.
10.1109/ASONAM55673.2022.10068681.resourcesOtherText: Moral Foundations News Corpus (Weber et al. 2018)
